string.name: wallpaper_permission_reason
string.value: Used to set wallpaper for lock screen assistance features

string.name: internet_permission_reason
string.value: Used to access network resources for application functionality

string.name: network_info_permission_reason
string.value: Used to get network information for connectivity features

string.name: background_permission_reason
string.value: Used to keep the application running in background for lock screen assistance

string.name: notification_permission_reason
string.value: Used to control notifications for lock screen assistance features
